snippet: Fighting around the country’s largest city, Aleppo, intensified and a village near the city’s military airport was recaptured by government troops.
abstract: Embattled Syrian government mounts attacks on rebel positions across country; fighting intensifies in and around country’s largest city Aleppo after government forces regain control of Aziza, village near city’s military airport.
lead_paragraph: Fighting around the country’s largest city, Aleppo, intensified and a village near the city’s military airport was recaptured by government troops.

headline.seo: Syrian Forces Push Back at Rebel Positions
headline.main: Assad Forces Push Back at Rebels Across Syria
headline.print_headline: Assad Forces Push Back At Rebels Across Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
